resources.string: ClickMechanic was originally developed to help travellers locate places like Local Vehicle Repair Shops, Grocery Stores, Medical Stores, keeping in mind that such places arenâ€™t available on Google Maps also sometimes, especially where remote areas are concerned. Just create an account, click a button, and get the location of some of the most important stores. ClickMechanic ensures you always have a local guide in your pocket.
